title: Here’s a gift idea for Apple fans: This refurbished MacBook Pro is under $240!
content:
Macworld

The holidays will be here before you know it. Need a budget-friendly computer to manage your gift list, do your online shopping, or even give to someone special (aka your Apple-obsessed loved one)? This pre-loved 13.3-inch MacBook Pro may be ideal since it’s now only $235.97 (reg. $349) through November 9th!

The 13.3” MacBook Pro is a perfect option for anyone who needs a portable computer for home use, travel, or practically anything else. It features an Intel Core i5 processor for smoother performance, 4GB of RAM, and 500GB HDD for storing files and other media locally. And, perhaps best of all, it has a seven-hour battery (after a full charge!), so you can use it practically the entire workday without having to be around an AC outlet.

Yes, this model is a few years old, so it’s not likely to run the latest apps. However, it’s been professionally cleaned and inspected to ensure it operates well. In fact, it has a Grade B refurbishment rating, meaning it may have light scuffing on the bevel or case, but its performance shouldn’t be impacted.

Surprise the Apple lover in your life with this refurbished 13.3-inch MacBook Pro in silver, now just $235.97. No coupon is needed, but this offer only lasts until November 9th at 11:59pm!

 

Apple MacBook Pro 13.3″ Intel Core i5 4GB 500GB HDD – Silver (Refurbished)

Only $235.97 through Macworld!

Prices subject to change.
